description: as much use as a flat Tyre
summary: fantastic if you like an app to do nothing

description: I had a usb2 hub that had a keyboard, a mouse, and a bluetooth dongle plugged into it. It stopped working in the USB2 ports but would work in the USB3 ports. Other devices still worked in the USB2 ports so I suspected there was not a hardware problem. This utility with the "usbreset" command instantly solved my problem! I saw the negative reviews and wanted to add my positive experience.
summary: usbreset command in this utility solved my problem

description:
Ich komme nicht damit (Angeblich snap Version 8-1 vom 04.06.2021) zurecht. 
Software startet nicht. Auch nicht nach Erlaubnis Zugriff auf USB-Devices.
Keine Anleitung zu finden.
